channel.title: Need help with my command

item.title: Need help with my command
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hello, I made a command called superman for admins… its like fly or “god” cept it has a gfx, everything works, but the only thing is… you know how you lavitate right? with the god and fly command? mine does that, IF i dont wield a 2handed weapon… I want to get it so i can still wield the 2handed weapon and still lavitate…

Heres what my command on the setting emote looks like…

if(isSuperMan == true) { { playerSE = 1501; playerSEA = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSET = 1501; playerSET180 = 1501; playerSET90wc = 1501; playerSET90ccw = 1501; stillgfx(246, absY, absX); if (item2handed(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) == true) { playerSE = 1501; playerSEA = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSET = 1501; playerSET180 = 1501; playerSET90wc = 1501; playerSET90ccw = 1501; stillgfx(246, absY, absX); } }}

The code has no errors, but it just doesn’t work with 2handers…

Read full topic
